name: Airborrn Aviation Services, LLC
about: Airborrn Aviation Services, LLC, based at the Mariposa-Yosemite Airport (KMPI) and with an additional facility at Merced-Macready Airport (KMCE), offers a comprehensive range of aviation services. We provide scenic air tours over Yosemite National Park and the Sierra Nevada mountain range, photo missions, charter flights through Yosemite Airways, flight instruction, aircraft rentals, and maintenance services. Our fleet includes a classic Cessna R172K-XP, and we offer 24-hour self-serve fueling services. Our team includes experienced scenic air tour pilots, flight instructors, and A&P/IA maintenance technicians. We are committed to providing exceptional hospitality and aviation experiences, making us a premier choice for both tourists and aviators. Join us to experience the beauty of Yosemite from a unique perspective.
